overview: An opera-video on the futurist poet Chlebnikov (theorician of the "transmental language" a complex work that entangles cinematographic and historical memories with electronic procedures made of a web of rigour and emotion). A portrait of a time, of a poet, of one or many utopia at the same time. An electronic elegy with among other elements, music from Paternak.
title: SqueeZangeZaum
